mapper.sql: PRESC_DATE, PRESC_NO, ITEM_NO, DRUG_CODE, DRUG_SPEC, DRUG_NAME, FIRM_ID, PACKAGE_SPEC, PACKAGE_UNITS, QUANTITY, COSTS, PAYMENTS, ORDER_NO, ORDER_SUB_NO, ADMINISTRATION, FLAG, DOSAGE_EACH, DOSAGE_UNITS, FREQUENCY, FREQ_DETAIL, BATCH_NO, INVENTORY
mapper.insert: insert into DRUG_PRESC_DETAIL (PRESC_DATE, PRESC_NO, ITEM_NO, DRUG_CODE, DRUG_SPEC, DRUG_NAME, FIRM_ID, PACKAGE_SPEC, PACKAGE_UNITS, QUANTITY, COSTS, PAYMENTS, ORDER_NO, ORDER_SUB_NO, ADMINISTRATION, FLAG, DOSAGE_EACH, DOSAGE_UNITS, FREQUENCY, FREQ_DETAIL, BATCH_NO, INVENTORY) values (#{prescDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{prescNo,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{itemNo,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{drugCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{drugSpec,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{drugName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{firmId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{packageSpec,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{packageUnits,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{quantity,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{costs,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{payments,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{orderNo,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{orderSubNo,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{administration,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{flag,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{dosageEach,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{dosageUnits,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{frequency,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{freqDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{batchNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inventory,jdbcType=NUMERIC})

insert into DRUG_PRESC_DETAIL
PRESC_DATE,
PRESC_NO,
ITEM_NO,
DRUG_CODE,
DRUG_SPEC,
DRUG_NAME,
FIRM_ID,
PACKAGE_SPEC,
PACKAGE_UNITS,
QUANTITY,
COSTS,
PAYMENTS,
ORDER_NO,
ORDER_SUB_NO,
ADMINISTRATION,
FLAG,
DOSAGE_EACH,
DOSAGE_UNITS,
FREQUENCY,
FREQ_DETAIL,
BATCH_NO,
INVENTORY,
#{prescDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{prescNo,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
#{itemNo,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
#{drugCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{drugSpec,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{drugName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{firmId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{packageSpec,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{packageUnits,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{quantity,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
#{costs,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
#{payments,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
#{orderNo,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
#{orderSubNo,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
#{administration,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{flag,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
#{dosageEach,jdbcType=NUMERIC},

#{freqDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

#{inventory,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
mapper.select:
select
from PHARMACY.DRUG_PRESC_DETAIL where PRESC_NO = #{prescNo,jdbcType=NUMERIC} and PRESC_DATE >= TRUNC(SYSDATE) AND PRESC_DATE < TRUNC(SYSDATE) + 1
